attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that we make Stephen Fry Prime Minister. He is an absolute genius and a national treasure, being a completely honest and lovely man we should give him control over our country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
